headline: Meta, Amazon, and Goolge Lead a $700 Billion Capex Wave: What Stocks Win Beyond NVIDIA?
summary: The AI infrastructure arms race has reached a staggering scale. Hyperscalers are collectively pouring approximately $700 billion into AI CapEx in 2026. Amazon (Nasdaq: AMZN) just announced $200 billion in planned spend, Alphabet (Nasdaq: GOOGL) is projected $185, Meta Platforms (Nasdaq: META) up to $135 billion, and Microsoft will reveal an updated capex target closer to summer. ... Meta, Amazon, and Goolge Lead a $700 Billion Capex Wave: What Stocks Win Beyond NVIDIA?

headline: Broadcom Wi Fi 8 Launch Highlights AI Network Demand And Valuation Questions
summary: Broadcom (NasdaqGS:AVGO) has launched what it describes as the industry's first Wi-Fi 8 access point and switch solution for AI ready enterprise networks. The new offering combines a unified architecture with built in security, analytics, and AI acceleration for low latency, high bandwidth environments. This product is targeted at enterprises looking to support more data intensive workloads and AI applications across their network infrastructure. For you as an investor, this move sits...

headline: AI Chips Today - Arteris Achieves Major Milestone With Network-On-Chip Technology
summary: Arteris, Inc., a prominent semiconductor technology provider, has reached a significant milestone with its network-on-chip technology now deployed in over 4 billion chips and chiplets. This expansion reflects the growing adoption of Arteris' technology across a variety of sectors including AI-driven automotive, enterprise computing, and consumer electronics. The company's interconnect IP is increasingly crucial for modern AI-era chip designs, which demand high performance, energy efficiency,...
